    b.) 00,10101    (2) = 0.656250 (10)
    c.) 00,11011    (2) = 0.843750 (10)
    d.) 01,10001    (2) = 1.531250 (10)
    e.) 11,10010    (2) = 3.562500 (10)

Guia_0202:
    a.) 00,25000 (10)   = 0000_0000.0100_0000 (2)
    b.) 00,37500 (10)   = 0000_0000.0110_0000 (2)
    c.) 02,87500 (10)   = 0000_0010.1110_0000 (2)
    d.) 03,03125 (10)   = 0000_0011.0000_1000 (2)
    e.) 11,62500 (10)   = 0000_1011.1010_0000 (2)

Guia_0203:
    a.) 0,010011    (2) = 0000.1030  ( 4)
    b.) 0,100101    (2) = 000.450    ( 8)
    c.) 0,101110    (2) = 00.b8      (16)
    d.) 1,110101    (2) = 001.650    ( 8)
    e.) 1101,1101   (2) = 0d.d0      (16)

Guia_0204:
    a.) 0,132 ( 4)  = 0000_0000.0101_1010 (2)
    b.) 0,2C9 (16)  = 0000.023021 (4) 
    c.) 0,763 ( 8)  = 000.111_110_011 (2)
    d.) 7,321 ( 8)  = 01_11.01_10_10_00_10 -> 13.12202 (4)
    e.) A,C64 (16)  = 1010.1100_0110_0100 -> 10_10.11_00_01_10_01_00 -> 22.301210 (4) 

Guia_0205:
    a.) 101,01      (2) + 11,011    (2) = 0000_0101.0100_0000 (2) + 0000_0011.0110_0000 (2) = 0000_1000.1010_0000 (2)
    b.) 1001,011    (2) - 10,11     (2) = 0000_1001.0110_0000 (2) - 0000_0010.1100_0000 (2) = 0000_0110.1010_0000 (2)
    c.) 100,101     (2) * 11,01     (2) = 0000_0100.1010_0000 (2) * 0000_0011.0100_0000 (2) = 0000_1000.0000_0000 (2)
    d.) 10110,11    (2) / 10,001    (2) = 0001_0110.1100_0000 (2) / 0000_0010.0010_0000 (2) = 0000_0000.0000_1010 (2)
    e.) 1101011     (2) % 1011      (2) = 0110_1011.0000_0000 (2) % 0000_1011.0000_0000 (2) = 0000_1000.0000_0000 (2)
